tool_description: Creates database schema definitions with tables, columns, data types, constraints, and relationships for backend applications.

database_type.description: Type of database: mysql, postgresql, sqlite, mongodb

table_name.description: Name of the database table to create

primary_key.description: Name of the primary key column

error_messages: Invalid database type: Use one of [mysql, postgresql, sqlite, mongodb]
Empty table name: Provide a valid table name with alphanumeric characters and underscores only
Invalid column format: Use format 'name:type:constraints' for each column definition
Primary key not found: Ensure the primary_key matches one of the column names
Invalid foreign key format: Use format 'column:reference_table:reference_column'
usage: Specify database_type, table_name, columns array with proper formatting, and primary_key. Optionally add foreign_keys for relationships.

constraints.description: List of all constraints applied to the table
